channel.title: Npcdrops.cfg droprate problem
channel.description: I have a problem with my droprate i put it to 100 but still the item won't spawn every time npcdrop = 86 2142 1 100 npcdrop = 86 2142 1 100 npcdrop = 86 526 1 100 npcdrop = 86 995 1020 100 Why does this happen?. I will rep whoever helps me
